title: In Ferguson Shooting's Tumultuous Wake, Leaders Call For Peace And Protest
teaser: Tensions are still high in a Missouri town where a black teenager was fatally shot by a police officer on Saturday. Religious leaders and activists are calling for calm and peaceful demonstrations after three nights of protests that alternately involved looting and police in riot gear.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
